effect.x_y: Disables the target’s last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Disables the target’s last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.

short_effect.x_y: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.

flavor_text.x_y: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
